addCustomerToRoomRun(String, int) - Method in class Controller.SysData
This method adds a customer to a specific roomRun if his subscription fits, he has no other roomRuns at the time, and there is a free space in the class Hint: if needed, don't forget to rollback

addRoomRun(RoomRun) - Method in class Model.Instructor
This method adds a RoomRun to this instructor roomRuns if he is available at the time, roomRun's level not above his level and roomRun's type is included in his types.
